entries.meaning: (derogatory) One who uses overelaborate or wordy phrases.
examples: I was a true phrasemonger. I could not say a plain thing in a plain way. Simplicity, that one sure feature of truth, was to me sheer silliness.

verbs.description: phrasemonger (third-person singular simple present phrasemongers, present participle phrasemongering, simple past and past participle phrasemongered)

entries.meaning: (derogatory, intransitive) To use overelaborate or wordy phrases.
